documentation.text:
@title Staker Contract 
 @dev   Staking Contract mints new tokens every number blocks eg 100 and distributes proportion to stakers amount staked

@notice Get the current blockNumber
 @return returns the latest block number

@notice Change rate of reward distribution by changing blocksSchedule e.g every 4 blocks every 400 blocks etc 
 @param _newSchedule  number of blocks before distributing rewards to stakers

@notice Deposit RewardTokens into Staker Contract to earn staking rewards 
 @param _amount amount of RewardTokens to be staked

@notice  Withdraw an amount of RewardTokens
 @param _amount amount of RewardTokens to be withdrawn

@notice Withdraw all your balances in project (stake + rewards ) 
 @notice Can no longer earn rewards and is considered non-staker
@notice One of owners distirbutes rewards to stakers

attributes.text:
@title Staker Contract 
 @dev   Staking Contract mints new tokens every number blocks eg 100 and distributes proportion to stakers amount staked

@notice Get the current blockNumber
 @return returns the latest block number

@notice Change rate of reward distribution by changing blocksSchedule e.g every 4 blocks every 400 blocks etc 
 @param _newSchedule  number of blocks before distributing rewards to stakers

@notice Deposit RewardTokens into Staker Contract to earn staking rewards 
 @param _amount amount of RewardTokens to be staked

@notice  Withdraw an amount of RewardTokens
 @param _amount amount of RewardTokens to be withdrawn

@notice Withdraw all your balances in project (stake + rewards ) 
 @notice Can no longer earn rewards and is considered non-staker
@notice One of owners distirbutes rewards to stakers

devdoc.details: Staking Contract mints new tokens every number blocks eg 100 and distributes proportion to stakers amount staked

returns._rewards: the current amount of rewards earned by address _staker

returns._total: the current amount of rewards earned by address _staker

params._newSchedule: number of blocks before distributing rewards to stakers

params._amount: amount of new reward tokens that cna be distributed as rewards
amount of RewardTokens to be staked

params._staker: address to query if currently a staker

params._amount: amount of RewardTokens to be withdrawn

devdoc.title: Staker Contract

balanceRewards(address).notice: Get the current amount of RewardTokens address has earned as rewards for staking

balanceStaked(address).notice: Get the current amount of RewardTokens address has staked

balanceTotal(address).notice: Get the total amount of RewardTokens address currently has (balanceStaked + balanceRewards)

changeBlockSchedule(uint256).notice: Change rate of reward distribution by changing blocksSchedule e.g every 4 blocks every 400 blocks etc

changeDistributionAmount(uint256).notice: Change the amount of new RewardTokens that can be minted to distribute as rewardsOnly owner/admin can change this, new RewardTokens to distirbute must not be more than current supply

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposit RewardTokens into Staker Contract to earn staking rewards

isStaker(address).notice: Check if address is currently a staker in contract. If balanceStaked is zero through not having participated or withdrawals, address no longer staker

reward().notice: One of owners distirbutes rewards to stakers

withdraw().notice: Withdraw all your balances in project (stake + rewards ) Can no longer earn rewards and is considered non-staker
